comment:
People who have power, wealth, and fame can be very difficult people. Throw in that person being a decades long alcoholic and drug abuser, and you have no idea what is going on in their private life. Throw in the fact that this person's professional life was winding down with a string of poorly performing films, including one so bad it was pulled from theaters, which could have very well lead to him hitting the drugs and booze even harder. 

Also don't forget that over here in the UK Depp was found to be an abusive husband by the courts. So he was convicted in court.

Both of these people seem toxic, but trying to explain how Depp is innocent by listing people who weren't in the relationship with Depp and Heard is asinine. For all you know those people either never witnessed this type of behavior from Depp in person, or had seen him exhibit those types of behavior and are choosing to protect his image.

Police and governments routinely commit acts of terror all of the time on tape with audio, and still manage to find tons of people being willfully ignorant to those facts and siding with those Police and governments gas lighting white washing of the events

comment:
The British judge in the case "Justice" Nicol (whose *son* works with Dan Wootton at TALKradio, which is owned by the very company Mr. Depp was suing) found for NGN (not surprising), saying that Amber Heard "essentially told the truth" because "she gave her settlement away to charity" and "that is not the actions of a gold-digger".  *What have we learned since then?*  Well, it has already been entered into the evidence that Amber Heard *LIED* about donating her settlement to charity... she kept it for herself, believing everyone would be too stupid to check.  "Justice" Nicole has had to admit that Amber Heard *COMMITTED PERJURY* in the NGN Trial, but *apparently committing perjury in Britain during a trial has no legal ramifications, and does not decrease your credibility.*  That will not happen at the Virginia Trial.  The United States considers perjury a crime, and those who commit it are punished.  Australia also considers perjury and subornation of perjury very serious crimes, punishable by a large fine and fifteen years in prison... and that is what they are pursuing at this very moment.  The NGN Trial made public that Ms. Heard had not only committed perjury in the Australian Case, she was guilty of suborning the perjury of Kevin Murphy, under the threat of having him fired, to lessen her sentence.  Australia has publicly acknowledged that they are actively pursuing this series of crimes.

Before considering who spoke up for Mr. Depp, we should list all the other women who have claimed that Mr. Depp is abusive...                   there we go!  That's all of them!

J. K. Rowling is one of the group of Domestic Abuse Survivors who understands that Amber Heard is a textbook Narcissistic Abuser.  Narcissistic Abusers *always* accuse their victims of being the aggressors.  If you have survived narcissistic abuse, you will easily recognize a narcissist.  Every woman that Mr. Depp has ever had a serious relationship with has made statements not simply supporting that he was never abusive with them, but also declaring him incapable of being physically aggressive to a woman.  I think that it is important to note that Mr. Bettany was friends with Mr. Depp at the time of his marriage to Amber Heard, and experienced Mr. Depp *while Amber Heard's assaults against him were occurring.*  He not only knows who Johnny Depp is, he knows how Johnny Depp suffered through his marriage.  He knows how much Mr. Depp loved his wife, the attacks that he endured, and how he tried to help her.  Mr. Bettany risked a backlash, but stood up for what was right.

There is a glaring mistake at the end of this video.  Mr. Depp does not have to beat any charges.  Mr. Depp is the PLAINTIFF in the lawsuit, and Amber Heard is the DEFENDANT.  It is Amber Heard who stands accused of defaming Mr. Depp by continuing her claims of domestic abuse.  *THERE ARE NO CHARGES OF ABUSE AGAINST JOHNNY DEPP.*  When Amber Heard was granted a *TEMPORARY* restraining order against Mr. Depp, that began her accusations -- but she was required to provide *proof of domestic abuse* (that could include police report, doctor's affidavit, hospital form, x-ray, sworn testimony of credible witnesses, CCTV footage, legal recordings, verified texts... but she has none of these...  for someone who claims that her nose was broken on more than one occasion, her ribs were broken, and she suffered cuts from multiple broken alcohol bottles to her entire back and the bottoms of her feet, nothing she has ever suffered required a trip to the hospital, or a doctor) within a few weeks.  When the Judge was presented with Ms. Heard's poor excuses for evidence, and weighed it against Mr. Depp's evidence, which included the testimony of four Los Angeles Police Officers, one of which had Specialist Domestic Abuse Training... *the Judge DISMISSED Ms. Heard's case WITH PREJUDICE!*  That means that he found the case to be "egregiously flawed and without merit" and Ms. Heard can NEVER bring these charges against Mr. Depp again.  Mr. Depp has NEVER been arrested for, or charged with, domestic abuse.  *Amber Heard HAS been arrested for the domestic assault of her then wife, Tasya van Ree (at the request of Ms. van Ree) in 2009, at the Seattle/Tacoma International Airport.*
